use.flag: Omit all non-free software and binary blobs.
Pull in the Novena-patched kernel package(s).
Pull in the Novena-patched u-boot, install to /boot.
Pull in X.org drivers, and packages with a GUI.

pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a metapackage. Merge it to pull in the baseline set of Novena-specific packages, customized by USE-flag for your specific configuration.
